name: happenin'
tag_list: real-time-check-in, check-in, real-time, anonymous, anonymous-check-in, city-scouting, nightlife
overview:
Happenin’ is an App for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touches that shows hot Travel / Nightlife spots, Great Outdoor / Arts & Entertainment events and top Food / Shopping venues. Basically, Happenin’ helps you find things to do right now, happening around you or in a city near you!

Explore places you have never been to in your own city or town. Rather than wandering in and out of empty bars and lounges, Happenin’ shows you that a club few blocks down is packed. If you are in a random city on a Friday night and have no idea where it’s fun to hang out, you can rely on Happenin’ to show you the hottest areas with the best bars.

Looking for good marketing spots? Stop wasting time finding high traffic spots and instead direct your street marketing team of sign holders and advocates looking for signatures on petitions, by finding high foot traffic spots thanks to Foursquare’s trending data that powers Happenin’.

App Features: â€¢ Filter spots, events and venues by categories â€¢ View happening spots, events and venues on the map â€¢ Get directions to the spot, event or venue from your location â€¢ Add a spot, event or venue to your favorites for later viewing â€¢ Sort listed spots, events, and venues alphabetically or by distance â€¢ Share a spot, event or venue with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or Tumblr â€¢ See details about a venue, such as name, address, type and number of people checked-in
